site_name: SAINT VINCENT COLLEGE LIFE SCIENCE RESEARCH LAB

citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process between 3:38 - 4:10pm
on October 17, 2022. The inspector called and emailed the contact and waited for 30 minutes, but was unable to reach
the facility representative at that time.
End Section
